{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.10262v1", "title": "Whittaker modules for $U_q(\mathfrak{sl}_3)$", "summary": "In this paper, we study the Whittaker modules for the quantum enveloping
algebra $U_q(\sl_3)$ with respect to a fixed Whittaker function. We construct
the universal Whittaker module, find all its Whittaker vectors and investigate
the submodules generated by subsets of Whittaker vectors and corresponding
quotient modules. We also find Whittaker vectors and determine the
irreducibility of these quotient modules and show that they exhaust all
irreducible Whittaker modules. Finally, we can determine all maximal submodules
of the universal Whittaker module. The Whittaker model of $U_q(\sl_3)$ are
quite different from that of $U_q(\sl_2)$ and finite-dimensional simple Lie
algebras, since the center of our algebra is not a polynomial algebra.", "main_category": "math.RT", "categories": "math.RT", "published": "2025-04-14T14:27:35Z"}
